ygData.subject: Silk Armor & Cured Silk Armor (Recommended Skill Level)
ygData.msgSnippet: 1.    What is the recommended skill level before I could make Silk Armor at a reasonable rate? 2.    What is the recommended skill level before I could make
ygData.messageBody:
1. What is the recommended skill level before I could make "Silk Armor"
at a reasonable rate?

2. What is the recommended skill level before I could make "Cured Silk
Armor" at a reasonable rate?

3. What is the easiest part (cap, gorget, tunic, leggings, belt, cloak
etc...) to make for each type of armor? Can anyone list them down in order
of difficulties?

4. Where can I get a constant supply of spider silk near Qeynos area? I
am only level 11 so I cannot go to E.Karana.

Level 11 Qeynos Monk
Errollisi Marr
